Desc.entry: Managed by Enterprise Ventures. The Coalfields Funds offer up to £33 million of commercial equity funding to new and existing small to medium sized enterprises (SME) with the aim of supporting the growth of businesses and encouraging entrepreneurship in Englands former coalfield regions. Offers investment of up to £1 million in the form of equity and equity related funding. Companies must be SMEs, be unquoted (not on any stock exchange), operate in an eligible coal ward or employ a significant proportion of their workforce from an eligible coalfield ward or bring material economic benefit to an eligible coal ward and be able to produce a commercial return to the Funds on their investment.

ContactName.entry: Paul Betts, Investment Manager/Dawn Haworth, Fund Administrator
